attributes.action: To stop spending our money and our Tax to.............
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For Gorden Brown to stop spending our money and our Tax. also stop giving our money to China and other Country's around the world, when We are in the red and he should be looking after the people of the UK and our Country.

rejection.details: Please be more specific about what you are requesting the government do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
